metadata.title: Preflights - Vibe code without losing architecture
metadata.description: Vibe code fast. Don't lose architectural clarity. Preflights forces decisions to be explicit before AI writes code.

hero.title: Vibe code fast.
hero.subtitle: Preflights forces decisions to be explicit before AI writes code. So nothing important is left to assumptions.

problem.title: The real problem with AI-assisted coding
problem.intro: AI coding tools are incredibly fast. The real problem is not speed. It's what gets implemented without being explicitly decided:

implicit.title: Choices made by assumption
implicit.description: The AI picks patterns you never validated

inconsistencies.title: Inconsistencies across files
inconsistencies.description: Small choices compound into structural mess

debt.title: Technical drift noticed too late
debt.description: No one knows why it's built this way

problem.closing: AI doesn't lack intelligence. It lacks explicit context. Preflights exists to make that context explicit.

separation.title: A mental model, not a process
separation.intro: Most AI tools mix everything together. Preflights separates three activities that should never be confused:

specify.title: Specify
specify.description: Define what must be implemented now

separation.closing: Preflights does not generate code. It generates clarity.

pipeline.title: How it works
pipeline.intro: You start with an intention. If something is ambiguous or structurally impactful, Preflights asks a few targeted questions.

outputs.title: What you get

adr.title: Explicit decisions
adr.description: Captured and versioned when they matter.
adr.label: ADR

state.title: A living architecture snapshot
state.description: Compact, readable, always up to date.
state.label: STATE

outputs.closing: Plain Markdown. Readable by humans. Reliable for AI agents.

workflow.title: A simple, explicit flow

steps.step3: Decisions and an execution brief are written
steps.step4: Your AI agent implements — without deciding

workflow.punchline: AI executes. Humans decide. Preflights enforces the boundary.

integrations.title: Works with your existing AI tools

bullets.mcp: **Cursor, Claude and others** via MCP as a safety net
bullets.guardrail: Preflights is not a replacement. It's a guardrail.

items.question: Does Preflights write code?
items.answer: No. It produces explicit decisions and execution briefs. Your agent writes the code.

items.question: What if I already write very explicit prompts?
items.answer: Then you may not need Preflights. It's designed for moments where intent is still fuzzy.

items.question: Do I need to change my workflow?
items.answer: No. Preflights fits around your existing tools.

items.question: Is it only for Cursor/Claude?
items.answer: Works with any agent that reads Markdown and respects scope.

footer.tagline: For developers who vibe code — and ship clean.
